Text: Harry Just thought of saying hi since it has been an long time Hows everything in Houston Things in banking are slowing down Im just hoping that this project Im staffed on will go live There is a chance Most activity now in Asia is MA related You see crossborder deals happening ie Europe into Asia and Asia into the US High yield and convertibles appear to be rocketing Ive encountered a couple of personalities at Lehman but so far things are okay Just got the bonus and so Im thinking where to park the money Maybe Ill invest it in power technologysince California lacks electricity Who knows I heard from Jens that you moved to Enron Online Jens got a great vacation in Cuba I wish I could have joined him Well thats all for now Best regards Roy
